description: Changes the public visibility for a project. The project's build results, logs, and artifacts are available to the general public. For more information, see Public build projects in the CodeBuild User Guide.

parameters.name: projectArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the build project.

parameters.name: projectVisibility
parameters.description: Specifies the visibility of the project's builds. Possible values are: PUBLIC_READ The project builds are visible to the public. PRIVATE The project builds are not visible to the public.

nested_items.name: projectArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the build project.

nested_items.name: publicProjectAlias
nested_items.description: Contains the project identifier used with the public build APIs.

nested_items.name: projectVisibility
nested_items.description: Specifies the visibility of the project's builds. Possible values are:
